TopicTitle: How to upload new images to kerbalspaceprogram wiki?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to add KSP science region maps to our wiki topics, but none of my JPEG or PNG files are getting uploaded.  I fill out the fields and then click **Upload**, but I'm just returned to a blank upload form and no files get uploaded.

The upload form ( https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Special:Upload )has a warning at the top:

Quote

"At the moment it's not possible to upload any file. See also: Migration problems"

But I see other people have successfully uploaded new file in the past few days.  See: https://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Special:NewFiles

How are they doing this?  What is the new process for successfully uploading image files for use in the wiki?

Edited February 20 by rogerawong
